scripts.generate-manifest:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && mustache configs/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.generate-constants:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && mustache configs/rinkeby.json src/constants/index.ts.template > src/constants/index.ts
scripts.codegen:rinkeby: yarn generate-manifest:rinkeby && yarn generate-constants:rinkeby && graph codegen
scripts.generate-manifest:zksync2-testnet: yarn prepare:zksync2-testnet && mustache configs/zksync2-testnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.generate-constants:zksync2-testnet: yarn prepare:zksync2-testnet && mustache configs/zksync2-testnet.json src/constants/index.ts.template > src/constants/index.ts
scripts.codegen:zksync2-testnet: yarn generate-manifest:zksync2-testnet && yarn generate-constants:zksync2-testnet && graph codegen
scripts.deploy-the-graph:rinkeby: yarn codegen:rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service perpdex/perpdex-v1-rinkeby
scripts.deploy-the-graph:zksync2-testnet: yarn codegen:zksync2-testnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service perpdex/perpdex-v1-zksync2-testnet
